Events that occurred on 24 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1953 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to George Sayer.
1957 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 199.
1985 - Voice actor Valentine Dyall dies.
2011 - Tolkien Index is founded.
2012 - Voice actor James Grout dies.
2022 - The Great Tales Never End: Essays in Memory of Christopher Tolkien is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
